head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TARNOFF, EDWIN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TARNOFF, EDWIN M.

block.p: TARNOFF-Edwin M. Of Norwalk, CT. Husband of Betty Fertig Tarnoff, died September 10, 2000. Father of Jeffrey and Peter, grandfather of Sarah, Nicholas and Alexander. Funeral services at Temple Shalom, Richards Ave., Norwalk, CT, 11 AM, Tuesday, September 12, 2000. Family at home, Tuesday 5-8, Wednesday 4-7 PM.
